snippets.description: A while loop that executes a code block while a condition holds true
A for loop that iterates over table as dictionaries.
A for loop that iterates over table as array.
A for loop that executes a code block exp1 to exp2 times, (optionally) using exp3 to increment value. The default increment value is 1.
An if statement that executes a code block if a condition is true
An if statement that executes one code block if a condition is true, and another code block if it is not.
An if statement that executes one code block if a condition is true, or another code block if a secondary condition is true.
A generic class definition, using a table as the underlying data structure.
This prototype-based class defines class members, instance members, and metamethods in the same table and highlights Lua's strengths well.
A statement that creates a new instance of an object.
Returns the service with the requested class name, creating it if it does not exist.
A repeat...until loop is similar to a while loop, except that a do...while loop is guaranteed to execute at least one time.
